channel.title: Cloning you
channel.description: how i can clone me and make it a npc ?

item.title: Cloning you
item.dc:creator: @Woopzpkedu Woopzpkedu
item.description:
@Woopzpkedu wrote:

uhh here add this to entityDef.java if ur PI if(i == 180) { stream.currentOffset = streamIndices[630]; entityDef.aByte68 = 3; entityDef.readValues(stream); // Collect original NPC data entityDef.actions = new String[5]; entityDef.actions[1] = "Attack"; int changedColors = 1; // Number of model colors changed on the NPC entityDef.originalModelColors = new int[changedColors]; entityDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[changedColors]; entityDef.originalModelColors[0] = 40; // Original model color entityDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 34; // Changed model color entityDef.models = new int[9]; entityDef.models[0] = 9638;//cape entityDef.models[1] = 216;//head 235 entityDef.models[2] = 40207;//plate entityDef.models[3] = 5024;//legs entityDef.models[4] = 27731;//godsword entityDef.models[5] = 13319;//gloves 13307 entityDef.models[6] = 10683;//boots 10683 entityDef.models[7] = 17461;//darkness entityDef.models[8] = 20147;//arms entityDef.standAnim = 4300; entityDef.walkAnim = 4306; entityDef.anInt58 = 4306; //anInt58 anim entityDef.anInt83 = 4306; //Walk left anim entityDef.anInt55 = 4306; //walk right anim entityDef.name = "Dragon Knight"; entityDef.combatLevel = 176; entityDef.description = "A very powerful knight!".getBytes(); }

Read full topic

Get some to or model a character that looks like you. Then render the character as an NPC and add to game.

@KrypitcRc wrote:

I think he wants to make a custom NPC thats looks like his player with items equipped, I know it’s possible to make a custom NPC using item and player models but I have no idea how, Sorry :
(I hate custom things so I’ve never even tried to learn about model making)
